about_the_game:
This add-on is included in one or more sets. Please be careful not to buy the same content twice. Use of this add-on requires the full version of the game (sold separately). You may also need to install the most recent game patch.

Geese Howard, the charismatic face of evil from SNK, has joined the fray! Experience for yourself the overwhelming presence of the newest antagonist to emerge in TEKKEN 7! This pack also includes an exclusive stage with its own TEKKEN 7 spin, as well as the BGM "Soy Sauce for Geese" and two Geese costumes!

*Included in this add-on are Geese Howard as a playable character and a new stage. Geese Howard will also become playable in DLC1's new mode, "Ultimate TEKKEN BOWL."
detailed_description:
This add-on is included in one or more sets. Please be careful not to buy the same content twice. Use of this add-on requires the full version of the game (sold separately). You may also need to install the most recent game patch.

Geese Howard, the charismatic face of evil from SNK, has joined the fray! Experience for yourself the overwhelming presence of the newest antagonist to emerge in TEKKEN 7! This pack also includes an exclusive stage with its own TEKKEN 7 spin, as well as the BGM "Soy Sauce for Geese" and two Geese costumes!

*Included in this add-on are Geese Howard as a playable character and a new stage. Geese Howard will also become playable in DLC1's new mode, "Ultimate TEKKEN BOWL."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB, GTX 750Ti 2GB, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 equivalent or higher 
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
